Spark Session Creation.description: Creates a Spark session for a PySpark application

Pandas to Spark DF.description: Converts a Pandas DataFrame to a Spark DataFrame
Pandas to Spark DF.code:
import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

# Create Pandas DataFrame
pandas_df = pd.DataFrame({'col1': [1, 2], 'col2': [3, 4]})

# Convert to Spark DataFrame
spark_df = spark.createDataFrame(pandas_df)

Pandas DF to Workbook.description: Exports a Pandas DataFrame to an Excel workbook
Pandas DF to Workbook.code:
import pandas as pd

# Create Pandas DataFrame
df = pd.DataFrame({'col1': [1, 2], 'col2': [3, 4]})

# Save to Excel workbook
df.to_excel('output.xlsx', index=False)
